              "rstudio-start": "rserver"
          },

          ],
          "portsAttributes": {
              "8787": {
                  "label": "RStudio IDE"

external_script.R

```{r eval=FALSE}
#| code-line-numbers: "8-12"
# ----- Read in Libraries ----- #
## ---- libraries
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)
## ---- stop

# ----- Read in the File ----- #
## ---- read-chunk
(df <- airquality %>%
  arrange(desc(Month)) %>%
  as_tibble())
## ---- stop

# ----- Make a Plot ----- #
## ---- make-plot
(
  plot <- df |>
    ggplot() + 
    geom_point(aes(Ozone,Temp)) +
    facet_grid(~Month)
)
## ---- stop
```
